name: Murder Island
description:
Murder Island - Adventure series

Murder Island takes you on a humorous non-linear journey set in an Island resort. The resort is built in a western style town. In this game, you play as Detective Sherkey Romes who is commonly mistaken for the world famous Dr. Datsun, his supervisor. 

Talk to different characters on the island and uncover clues about who could be the murderer. Run errands for locals to win their trust and solve the case. Use your inventory to combine items and exchange them for other items.

Good Luck Detective!
